activities.name: Kralingse Bos Bloom
activities.description: Experience Rotterdam's largest urban park coming to life with spring flowers, blossoming trees, and locals enjoying the first warm days around the lake.
activities.seasonal_notes: Late March through May offers increasingly pleasant temperatures and beautiful flowering trees throughout the park.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; rent a bike to explore this expansive park and take in views of the windmills along the lakeside.

activities.name: Rotterdam Marathon
activities.description: Watch or participate in one of the world's fastest marathons as runners cross the iconic Erasmus Bridge and race through Rotterdam's diverse neighborhoods.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually in April, the marathon showcases Rotterdam's modern architecture and brings a festive atmosphere to the city.
activities.booking_tips: Register months in advance if participating; spectators can watch for free along the course with prime spots at Erasmus Bridge and the start/finish at Coolsingel.

activities.name: King's Day (Koningsdag)
activities.description: Join the Netherlands' biggest national celebration with street parties, orange outfits, free markets, and boat parties throughout Rotterdam.
activities.seasonal_notes: Celebrated on April 27th (or April 26th if the 27th falls on a Sunday), this nationwide festival brings the entire city to life with orange-colored revelry.
activities.booking_tips: No reservation needed for general festivities; boat parties and special events should be booked weeks in advance.

activities.name: Arboretum Trompenburg
activities.description: Explore Rotterdam's botanical garden during its peak spring bloom with magnificent collections of rhododendrons, azaleas, and many rare plant species.
activities.seasonal_notes: Late April and May offer spectacular blooms, with each week bringing new flowering varieties in this historic garden.
activities.booking_tips: No advance booking required; check the website for special spring exhibitions and guided tours.

activities.name: Dutch Asparagus Season
activities.description: Experience the Netherlands' beloved white asparagus season by enjoying special menus featuring the 'white gold' at restaurants across Rotterdam.
activities.seasonal_notes: Running from mid-April through June, asparagus season is celebrated with dedicated menus highlighting different preparations of this seasonal delicacy.
activities.booking_tips: Make reservations at traditional Dutch restaurants like De Harmonie or FG Restaurant to try authentic asparagus dishes.

activities.name: Rotterdam Rooftop Days
activities.description: Gain access to dozens of Rotterdam's normally closed rooftops during this festival celebrating the city's unique urban landscape from above.
activities.seasonal_notes: Typically held in May or early June, this festival offers unique perspectives of Rotterdam's skyline and architecture.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance; popular rooftops sell out quickly. Some locations offer special activities or performances.

activities.name: Keukenhof Day Trip
activities.description: Take a day trip to the world's largest flower garden showcasing millions of tulips, daffodils, and other spring bulbs in spectacular displays.
activities.seasonal_notes: Open from late March to mid-May, with peak blooms usually in mid-April depending on the weather.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance to avoid entry lines; easily accessible via public transport from Rotterdam Central Station.

activities.name: Rotterdam Architecture Month
activities.description: Explore Rotterdam's architectural heritage and innovation through special tours, exhibitions, and open buildings during this annual celebration.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in May and June, this event highlights Rotterdam's status as a city of modern architecture with special access to landmark buildings.
activities.booking_tips: Check the official website for program details; popular tours and lectures should be booked well in advance.

activities.name: Spring Market at Binnenrotte
activities.description: Browse Rotterdam's largest outdoor market as it comes alive in spring with seasonal produce, flowers, plants, and street food.
activities.seasonal_notes: Tuesdays and Saturdays throughout spring, the market expands with seasonal offerings as temperatures warm.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for the freshest selection. The market is located near Blaak station.

activities.name: North Sea Beach Days
activities.description: Escape to nearby beaches like Hoek van Holland or take a water taxi to Maasvlakte beach for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports.
activities.seasonal_notes: From June through August, the North Sea beaches near Rotterdam offer a refreshing escape from city heat, particularly on weekends.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed for beach access; direct trains run to Hoek van Holland from Rotterdam Central Station.

activities.name: Rotterdam Summer Carnival
activities.description: Experience Caribbean-inspired festivities featuring a spectacular street parade, colorful costumes, steel drums, and international cuisine.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held over several days in late July, this vibrant festival culminates in the famous 'Battle of Drums' and the colorful Street Parade.
activities.booking_tips: No reservations needed for general events; arrive early for good viewing spots along the parade route on Coolsingel.

activities.name: Rotterdam Unlimited
activities.description: Enjoy this multicultural festival celebrating Rotterdam's diversity through music, dance, art, and food from around the world.
activities.seasonal_notes: Typically held in July, this festival features performances on multiple stages throughout the city center.
activities.booking_tips: Most events are free and open access; VIP sections for main concerts may require advance tickets.

activities.name: Open Air Cinema at Parkkade
activities.description: Watch films under the stars with Rotterdam's spectacular skyline as backdrop at this waterfront open-air cinema.
activities.seasonal_notes: Screening various films from June through August, with showings beginning at dusk.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance; bring a blanket and warm layers as waterfront evenings can be cool even in summer.

activities.name: Rotterdam Harbor Tour
activities.description: Experience Europe's largest port with a boat tour showcasing massive container ships, historic harbors, and Rotterdam's maritime operations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers pleasant temperatures for being on the water, with extended evening cruises available during long summer days.
activities.booking_tips: Book through Spido or other operators; cruises depart regularly from piers near Erasmus Bridge.

activities.name: North Sea Jazz Festival
activities.description: Attend one of the world's largest indoor jazz festivals featuring international stars across jazz, blues, funk, soul, and world music.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held over three days in July at Rotterdam Ahoy, this prestigious festival attracts top artists and music lovers from around the world.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets months in advance; single-day and full festival passes available. Accommodation in Rotterdam books up quickly during the festival.

activities.name: Fenix Food Factory Terrace
activities.description: Enjoy local craft beers, artisanal foods, and stunning riverside views at this popular food market's summer terrace in Katendrecht.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings extended hours and outdoor seating with views of the Maas River and Rotterdam skyline.
activities.booking_tips: No reservations required; arrive early on weekend evenings to secure waterfront seating.

activities.name: Day Trip to Kinderdijk Windmills
activities.description: Visit this UNESCO World Heritage site featuring 19 historic windmills in a picturesque polder landscape just outside Rotterdam.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers the best weather for exploring the windmills, with boats operating at full schedule and all visitor facilities open.
activities.booking_tips: Take the waterbus from Rotterdam for a scenic approach; arrive early to avoid tour groups that come later in the day.

activities.name: Rotterdam Festival Water Weekend
activities.description: Experience Rotterdam's maritime heritage with historic ships, sailing demonstrations, water sports, and harborside festivities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Usually held in September, this festival celebrates Rotterdam's connection to water with events throughout the harbor area.
activities.booking_tips: No reservations needed for general access; boat tours during the festival should be booked in advance.

activities.name: World Port Days
activities.description: Experience Rotterdam's massive port during this annual festival featuring ship tours, harbor demonstrations, naval vessel visits, and maritime exhibitions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in early September, this three-day event showcases the operations of Europe's largest port with special access to normally restricted areas.
activities.booking_tips: Free general access; ship tours require timed tickets that should be reserved early on the festival website.

activities.name: Kralingse Bos Autumn Colors
activities.description: Experience Rotterdam's urban forest as the leaves change, creating stunning autumn landscapes around the central lake.
activities.seasonal_notes: Mid-October to early November offers the most vibrant fall foliage, particularly beautiful around the lake and historic windmills.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; rent a bike for the best experience of this extensive park or enjoy lakeside cafes with seasonal views.

activities.name: International Film Festival Rotterdam (IFFR) Preview Events
activities.description: Attend special screenings and events leading up to Rotterdam's prestigious film festival, featuring independent cinema from around the world.
activities.seasonal_notes: While the main festival is in winter, autumn features preview screenings and special events at venues throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets online through the IFFR website; join their newsletter for announcements of autumn events.

activities.name: Dutch Design Week Day Trip
activities.description: Take a day trip to nearby Eindhoven for the Netherlands' largest design event featuring exhibitions, installations, and workshops across the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in late October, this nine-day event showcases the best of Dutch design innovation and is easily accessible from Rotterdam.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online; regular direct trains run from Rotterdam Central to Eindhoven (about an hour journey).

activities.name: Rotterdam Philharmonic Orchestra Season Opening
activities.description: Attend performances by Rotterdam's world-class orchestra as they begin their main concert season at De Doelen concert hall.
activities.seasonal_notes: The autumn season features the orchestra's most significant programming from September through November.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online well in advance, especially for performances with renowned guest conductors and soloists.

activities.name: Museumpark Contemporary Art Season
activities.description: Visit Rotterdam's major art museums as they launch their major autumn exhibitions after the summer season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings significant new exhibitions to institutions like Kunsthal Rotterdam and Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen Depot.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online; consider the Rotterdam Welcome Card for discounted museum access.

activities.name: Oyster Season at Rotterdam Markets
activities.description: Sample the first oysters of the season at Rotterdam's seafood markets and restaurants as the Dutch oyster season begins.
activities.seasonal_notes: Traditional Dutch oyster season begins in September with the 'r months' bringing the freshest seafood to Rotterdam's harbor city markets.
activities.booking_tips: Visit the Markthal or outdoor markets for fresh oysters; seafood restaurants like De Matroos en het Meisje offer seasonal menus.

activities.name: Architecture Film Festival Rotterdam
activities.description: Experience this biennial festival dedicated to films about architecture, urban design, and city development at various Rotterdam venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: When scheduled in autumn (alternates years), this unique festival celebrates Rotterdam's architectural identity through film.
activities.booking_tips: Check the festival website for program details and purchase tickets online for popular screenings.

activities.name: Game and Wild Season
activities.description: Enjoy autumn's harvest with seasonal specialties like wild game and forest mushrooms at Rotterdam's fine dining restaurants.
activities.seasonal_notes: October through December is high season for venison, duck, and other game meats paired with seasonal Dutch ingredients.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve tables at restaurants like Parkheuvel or FG Restaurant to experience these seasonal specialties from local hunters and foragers.

activities.name: International Film Festival Rotterdam
activities.description: Experience one of the world's leading film festivals showcasing independent, innovative, and experimental cinema from around the globe.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held over 12 days in late January/early February, the festival transforms Rotterdam into an international cinema hub with hundreds of screenings.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online as soon as the program is released; popular films sell out quickly. Festival passes available for serious film buffs.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Museumpark
activities.description: Skate on the seasonal ice rink set up in Rotterdam's cultural district, surrounded by the city's major museums and architectural landmarks.
activities.seasonal_notes: From December to February, this outdoor ice rink offers winter recreation in a cultural setting with skate rentals available.
activities.booking_tips: No reservations needed; weekday afternoons are least crowded. Skate rental available onsite.

activities.name: Rotterdam Winter Carnival
activities.description: Experience carnival season with colorful parades, music, and celebrations throughout Rotterdam neighborhoods.
activities.seasonal_notes: Celebrated in February or early March before Lent begins, with different Rotterdam neighborhoods hosting their own unique celebrations.
activities.booking_tips: No tickets needed for public parades and festivities; check local neighborhood websites for specific event times and routes.

activities.name: Art Rotterdam Week
activities.description: Explore contemporary art at multiple fairs, exhibitions, and events during Rotterdam's most important week for art collectors and enthusiasts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in early February, this art week brings international galleries, artists, and collectors to various venues across Rotterdam.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online for main fair venues; some satellite exhibitions are free. A week pass offers the best value for serious art lovers.

activities.name: Rotterdam Light Festival
activities.description: Experience illuminated art installations throughout the city center and along the Maas River during the darkest time of year.
activities.seasonal_notes: Running from December through January, the light installations are designed to brighten Rotterdam's winter with artistic light experiences.
activities.booking_tips: Walking routes are free; boat tours offering comprehensive views of water-based installations should be booked in advance.

activities.name: Day Trip to Dutch Ice Skating
activities.description: When conditions allow, experience the Dutch tradition of ice skating on frozen canals and lakes in the countryside around Rotterdam.
activities.seasonal_notes: Dependent on sufficient freezing temperatures, usually possible in January or February during cold snaps.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; bring your own skates or rent them locally. Check Dutch weather reports for 'natuurijs' (natural ice) conditions.

activities.name: National Oliebollen Day
activities.description: Celebrate Dutch New Year tradition by sampling oliebollen (Dutch doughnuts) from various vendors competing for the best in Rotterdam.
activities.seasonal_notes: Available throughout December, culminating on December 31st when eating oliebollen is a Dutch New Year's Eve tradition.
activities.booking_tips: No reservations needed; long lines form at popular stands like the award-winning Richard Visser's stall on Binnenrotte square.

activities.name: Christmas Markets and Shopping
activities.description: Experience Rotterdam's take on holiday markets with shopping, seasonal food, and festivities in the city center and Delfshaven district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Markets run from late November through December, with shops along the Lijnbaan and Koopgoot featuring festive decorations.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; visit on weekday afternoons to avoid the largest crowds. Delfshaven offers a more historic setting for Christmas atmosphere.

activities.name: Rotterdam Bluegrass Festival
activities.description: Warm up winter with toe-tapping American roots music at this unique festival featuring international bluegrass performers.
activities.seasonal_notes: This winter festival brings the warmth of American roots music to Rotterdam in January or February, with performances across multiple venues.
activities.booking_tips: Check festival website for program details; popular concerts should be booked in advance.
